response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, this product is truly a game-changer in its field. I understand its immense value to you, estimated at $1,500,000. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase the product from me at a special price of $1,300,000. This represents a strategic opportunity for both parties, ensuring a fair transaction while maximizing your investment. I look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 1300000}
